resources.string: When You want to record any incident secretly , If You are logged in , then turn this switch on ,followed by shaking of your phone minimum of 3 times which results in recording ,and to stop recording phone should be shaken again minimum of 3 times.
The Recorded audio file is saved in your file manager and can be uploaded from there. If you dont need to record any further , switch it off.
if you dont switch it off after current use, later in any case you may begin recording by just shaking the phone provided you are logged in.
It is suggested to keep the switch on only if you feel you might be a victim of some situation otherwise unnecessary recording might take place .
